talents.name: Rogue Martial Path
talents.text: You gain the following Combat Training and the way to regain Stamina Points:

subTalents.name: Stamina Regen
subTalents.text: Once per round, you can regain up to half your maximum SP when you hit a target who is Prone, Flanked, affected by at least 1 Condition or who you are hidden from or you gain the benefits of your Cunning Action.

talents.name: Debilitating Strike
talents.text: When you make an Attack with a Weapon, you can spend 1 SP to force the target to make a Physical Save against your Save DC. Save Failure: Until the start of your next turn, the target suffers 1 of the following effects of your choice: Deafened, Exposed, Hindered, or Slowed 2. A target can’t be affected by the same option more than once at a time.

subTalents.name: Cunning action
subTalents.text: You gain movement equal to half your Speed when you take the Disengage, Feint, or Hide Actions. You can use this movement immediately before or after you take the Action.

subTalents.name: Skill Expertise
subTalents.text: Your Skill Mastery Limit and your Skill Mastery in a chosen skill increases by 1, up to Grandmaster (+10). A Skill can only benefit from one increase to its Mastery limit.

talents.name: Cypher Speech (Flavor Feature)
talents.text: You become Fluent in a Mortal Language of your choice. Additionally, you understand how to speak in code with a specific demographic of your choice (such as upper society, lower society, a faction, etc.). Your coded messages can be concealed in normal conversation and written communications. This allows you to leave simple messages such as “Safety” , “Threat” , or “Wealth” , or mark the location of a cache, a secret passageway, a safehouse, or an area of danger.
